channel.title: briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: FCC chair suggests agency isn't independent, word cut from mission statement

item.description: A group of House Republican centrists defied House Speaker Mike Johnson (R-La.) on Wednesday and helped House Democrats secure the 218 signatures need...

item.title: Oscars heading for YouTube after more than 50 years on ABC

item.title: Moderate House Republicans join Democrats to force vote on ACA subsidies
item.description: The Senate has already rejected the plan, so the subsidies are still virtually certain to expire at the end of this year.

item.title: Trump administration admits to targeting blue states for energy grant cuts

item.title: To make newborn investment accounts a reality, Trump goes looking for donations
House Democrats roll out stock trading ban that includes Trump
item.description: The move could doom bipartisan efforts to ban stock trading, as Republicans may not back a measure that extends to the executive branch.

item.title: Vance tries to thread affordability needle in Rust Belt

item.title: Democrats think they’ve found their 2026 message — and Miami just backed it up
item.description: In races across the country, Democrats focused on promises to make life more affordable — even as they offered contrasting approaches.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
